algorithm_technique: Modified Kadane's algorithm applied to pairs of characters, considering counts and resets.
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum difference in counts between any two characters in any substring.
problem_summary_technical: Applies a modified Kadane's algorithm to all character pairs, tracking counts and resets for variance calculation.
key_insights: The problem can be reframed as finding the maximum subarray sum for (char1_count - char2_count).
Kadane's algorithm needs modification to handle cases where a character might not be present or to reset correctly.
Iterating through all pairs of characters is necessary as the variance can occur between any two distinct characters.
